changeSet.author: CONNECT_APP
changeSet.sql:
DECLARE @collectionIdTable TABLE(id int) INSERT INTO @collectionIdTable SELECT ID FROM ORGANISATION_COLLECTION oc WHERE oc.SHORTNAME <> 'sag'
DECLARE @collectionId int DECLARE @settingKey nvarchar(max) = N'availability_display' DECLARE @inStock varchar(MAX) = 'IN_STOCK' DECLARE @panelTitleInStock varchar(MAX) = 'In stock' DECLARE @colorInStock varchar(MAX) = '#000000'
DECLARE @listAvailText_inStock_de varchar(MAX) = 'An Lager in der Filiale' DECLARE @listAvailText_inStock_fr varchar(MAX) = 'En stock dans la filiale' DECLARE @listAvailText_inStock_it varchar(MAX) = 'In stock presso la filiale'
DECLARE @defaultDisplayOption varchar(MAX) = 'DISPLAY_TEXT' DECLARE CollectionCursor CURSOR FOR SELECT ID from @collectionIdTable OPEN collectionCursor FETCH NEXT FROM CollectionCursor INTO @collectionId WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN DECLARE @exisingAvailDidplaySetting nvarchar(MAX) = (SELECT SETTING_VALUE FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS where COLLECTION_ID=@collectionId AND SETTING_KEY=@settingKey) if @exisingAvailDidplaySetting NOT LIKE '%'+@inStock+'%' BEGIN DECLARE @singleLanguageTemplate varchar(MAX)= N'{"langIso":"{{langIso}}","content":"{{content}}"}' DECLARE @multipleLanguageTemplate varchar(MAX)= N'[]' DECLARE @en_json varchar(MAX) = JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(@singleLanguageTemplate, '$.langIso', 'fr'), '$.content', @listAvailText_inStock_fr) DECLARE @cs_json varchar(MAX) = JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(@singleLanguageTemplate, '$.langIso', 'it'), '$.content', @listAvailText_inStock_it) DECLARE @de_json varchar(MAX) = JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(@singleLanguageTemplate, '$.langIso', 'de'), '$.content', @listAvailText_inStock_de) DECLARE @listAvailText_inStock_json varchar(MAX) = JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(@multipleLanguageTemplate, 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@en_json)), 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@cs_json)), 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@de_json))
DECLARE @availTypeTemplate varchar(MAX) = N'{"availState":"{{avail_state}}","detailAvailText":[],"listAvailText":[],"title":"{{title}}}","description":"{{description}}","color":"{{color}}","confirmColor":"{{confirmColor}}","displayOption":"{{option}}"}' DECLARE @inStockJson varchar(MAX) = JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(@availTypeTemplate, '$.availState', @inStock), '$.detailAvailText', NULL), '$.listAvailText', JSON_QUERY(@listAvailText_inStock_json)), '$.title', @panelTitleInStock), '$.description', NULL), '$.color', @colorInStock), '$.confirmColor', NULL), '$.displayOption', @defaultDisplayOption)
DECLARE @updatedAvailDisplaySetting nvarchar(MAX) = JSON_MODIFY(@exisingAvailDidplaySetting, 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@inStockJson)) UPDATE dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS SET SETTING_VALUE = @updatedAvailDisplaySetting WHERE COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND SETTING_KEY =@settingKey END FETCH NEXT FROM CollectionCursor INTO @collectionId END CLOSE CollectionCursor DEALLOCATE CollectionCursor
